ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I buy cryptocurrency - desktop

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To place a market buy order using the Ndax website on your desktop, follow these steps: 1. Log in at ndax.io and go to your Dashboard. 2. Click Trade from the left-hand sidebar. 3. On the Trade page, click the Buy button (green) in the top right-hand corner. 4. Click the small grey arrow in the upper left corner and select the Crypto/CAD trading pair you want to use. 5. Select Market as your order type. 6. Enter the order size — either in crypto units or in CAD. 7. Click Place Buy Order.
✅ Your order will be executed instantly at the best available market price.
